snippet: The blueprint for rebuilding the house followed the post-Sandy building codes in clever and thrifty ways.
abstract: Architectural designer Ben Krone bought and re-built century-old home in Red Hook, Brooklyn, after it was rendered uninhabitable by Hurricane Sandy and completely gutted.
lead_paragraph: The blueprint for rebuilding the house followed the post-Sandy building codes in clever and thrifty ways.

headline.seo: Renovating a Home in a Flood Zone Without Drowning in Debt
headline.main: In Red Hook, Brooklyn, a House for a Rainy Day
